clinical_study.brief_title: Laryngeal Disorders and GERD in Assiut University
clinical_study.official_title: Prevalence of Laryngeal Disorders in Patients With GERD in Assiut University Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: Study laryngeal disorders by laryngoscopic examination by two physicians on GERD patients diagnosed by gastroenterology department by endoscopy and effect of GERD treatment for 3 months on these laryngeal disorders without any treatment to laryngeal disorders

primary_outcome.measure: Prevalence of laryngeal disorders in GERD patients
primary_outcome.time_frame: One year from February 2020 to February 2021
primary_outcome.description: Laryngoscopic examination of patients with GERD by two otorhinolaryngologist physicians

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of treatment of GERD on these laryngeal disorders
secondary_outcome.description: Treatment of GERD by gastroenterology department for 3 months and reexamination of patients by laryngoscopy for laryngeal disorders without any treatment to laryngeal disorders

intervention.description: Laryngoscopic examination of patients with GERD by two physicians

study_pop.textblock: Patients who diagnosed GERD by gastroenterology department before start of treatment of GERD Will examine by laryngoscopy for laryngeal lesions then they Will take treatment to GERD by gastroenterology department without any treatment to laryngeal disorders and study effect of GERD treatment on these laryngeal disorders

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Patients diagnosed GERD by gastroenterology department before start of treatment and have laryngeal symptoms
Exclusion Criteria:
- voice abusers as singers ,teachers and readers.
